analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus @442a *//
translated: Thus have I heard at one time,

original: gcig tu 'khod de /
analyzed: gcig tu 'khod de /
translated: Then many gods, with various complexions in the night, with their lights, at one time illuminated the Jeta Grove with light, and having approached where the Blessed One was, having paid homage to the Blessed One, they sat to one side.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas /
translated: Having sat to one side,

original: lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa mang du zhus so //
analyzed: lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa mang du zhus so //
translated: those gods made many praises to the Blessed One in verse.

original: lha dang mi rnams mang po yis //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams mang po yis //
translated: By many gods and humans,

original: bkra shis pas ni bsam gyur pa //
analyzed: bkra shis pas ni bsam gyur pa //
translated: May your wishes be fulfilled through auspiciousness.

original: bkra shis pa la the tshom skyes //
analyzed: bkra shis pa la the tshom skyes //
translated: Doubt has arisen regarding auspiciousness.

original: bkra shis mchog ni gsung du gsol //
analyzed: bkra shis mchog ni gsung du gsol //
translated: Please speak of the supreme auspiciousness.

original: lha'i yang lha yis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: lha'i yang lha yis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The god of gods declared:

original: sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms //
translated: All negativity is completely destroyed.

original: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don //
translated: For the benefit of the entire world,

original: bkra shis de rnams khyed la bshad //
analyzed: bkra shis de rnams khyed la bshad //
translated: I will explain those auspicious things.

original: byis pa rnams la bsnyen mi bya //
analyzed: byis pa rnams la bsnyen mi bya //
translated: Do not attend to the childish,

original: mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya //
translated: But attend to the wise.

original: mchod la mchod pa'i lan bya ba //
analyzed: mchod la mchod pa'i lan bya ba //
translated: In worship, one should repay worship.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: sngar byas pa yi bsod nams kyis //
analyzed: sngar byas pa yi bsod nams kyis //
translated: Through previously accumulated merit,

original: mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // bdag nyid mchog gi smon lam bya //
analyzed: mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // bdag nyid mchog gi smon lam bya //
translated: Dwelling in a suitable country, one should make supreme aspirations.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //üîΩbden dang lag pa'i bzo dang ni //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so // bden dang lag pa'i bzo dang ni //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.üîΩTruth, craftsmanship,

original: 'dul ba'i sbyor bas legs par bslabs //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i sbyor bas legs par bslabs //
translated: And training through the application of discipline,

original: gang gis legs @442b par bshad pa'i tshig /
analyzed: gang gis legs @442b par bshad pa'i tshig /
translated: By which the words of good advice

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur bya //
analyzed: pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur bya //
translated: Serve one's father and mother.

original: bu dang chung ma rjes su bzung //
analyzed: bu dang chung ma rjes su bzung //
translated: Take care of your children and wife,

original: mi mthun pa yi las mi bya //
analyzed: mi mthun pa yi las mi bya //
translated: And do not do any unwholesome deeds.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.üîΩPractice generosity and the Dharma,

original: sbyin pa chos kyi spyod pa dang // gnyen 'dun rnams ni rjes su bzung //
analyzed: sbyin pa chos kyi spyod pa dang // gnyen 'dun rnams ni rjes su bzung //
translated: And take care of your relatives,

original: kha na ma tho'i las mi bya //
analyzed: kha na ma tho'i las mi bya //
translated: And do not do any unwholesome deeds.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: sdig la dga' ba spang bar bya //
analyzed: sdig la dga' ba spang bar bya //
translated: Abandon delighting in evil,

original: chang gi btung ba rnam par spang //
analyzed: chang gi btung ba rnam par spang //
translated: And completely give up drinking alcohol,

original: gang zhig chos la bag yod pa //
analyzed: gang zhig chos la bag yod pa //
translated: And be heedful in the Dharma.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: glo bur bla ma gus par bya //
analyzed: glo bur bla ma gus par bya //
translated: Respectfully serve the guru who arrives unexpectedly,

original: byas pa shes shing gus par bya //
analyzed: byas pa shes shing gus par bya //
translated: Be grateful and respectful,

original: dus su chos ni mnyan par bya //
analyzed: dus su chos ni mnyan par bya //
translated: And listen to the Dharma at the right time.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: tshig ngan pa ni bzod par bya //
analyzed: tshig ngan pa ni bzod par bya //
translated: Be patient with harsh words,

original: dge sbyong rnams ni mthong bar bya //
analyzed: dge sbyong rnams ni mthong bar bya //
translated: See the ascetics,

original: dus su chos kyi 'bel gtam bya //
analyzed: dus su chos kyi 'bel gtam bya //
translated: And have Dharma discussions at the right time.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: dka' thub dang ni tshangs spyod bya //
analyzed: dka' thub dang ni tshangs spyod bya //
translated: Practice austerities and pure conduct,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bya //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bya //
translated: And see the noble truths.

original: mya ngan 'das pa mngon sum bya //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mngon sum bya //
translated: And manifest nirvana.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: 'jig rten chos la dris pa na //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos la dris pa na //
translated: When asked about worldly matters,

original: gang zhig sems ni g-yo mi bya //
analyzed: gang zhig sems ni g-yo mi bya //
translated: One should not be deceitful in mind,

original: mya ngan mi dga' med bzod bya //
analyzed: mya ngan mi dga' med bzod bya //
translated: But be patient without sorrow or joy.

original: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so //
translated: This is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: de ltar bshad par byas pa rnams //
analyzed: de ltar bshad par byas pa rnams //
translated: All those who have been explained

original: thams cad du ni rgyal ba dang // thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gro /
analyzed: thams cad du ni rgyal ba dang // thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gro /
translated: Will be victorious in every way And go to peace in every way.

original: de rnams de la mchog bkra shis //
analyzed: de rnams de la mchog bkra shis //
translated: For them, this is the supreme auspiciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken thus,

original: lha de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod @443a *//
analyzed: lha de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod @443a *//
translated: Those gods greatly praised the Blessed One's words.

original: do; ;bkra shis chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: do; ;bkra shis chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Sutra of Great Auspiciousness is complete.

original: pandi ta chen po a'a nanda shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: pandi ta chen po a'a nanda shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
translated: By the great pandita Anan-shriüîΩAnd the Sakya monk Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo, a translator who knows two languages,

analyzed: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa /
translated: At the seat of those who speak two languages,

original: gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //

original: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang / zla ba ltar gyur cig ///
analyzed: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang / zla ba ltar gyur cig ///
translated: May it become like the sun and moon on the face of the earth.
